title: Villa of the Octavii
description: The archaeological remains of a Roman villa on the hill of San Cesareo are speculatively identified as belonging to the gens Octavia, according to Della Portella 2004 op. cit.

properties.description: 1:150,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 21020
